Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => x ^ k / INR (fact k)) n).

ctx: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => x ^ k / INR (fact k)) n).

original: induction n. - intros. simpl. lra. - intros. simpl. apply Rle_trans with (r2 := exp x). + apply Rle_trans with (r2 := sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => x ^ k / INR (fact k)) n). * apply IHn. intros. apply H. lia. * apply Taylor_Lagrange with (y := x) (n := n). ++ lia. ++ intros. apply H. lia. + apply exp_pos.
